title: Vivox Authorization Service
description: Integrate Vivox voice chat into your game with the Vivox Authorization Service. This service issues short-lived Vivox tokens through AGS, making it easy to securely connect your clients to Vivox voice.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Go
repositories.description: Go template for generating Vivox tokens and integrating with AGS.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - C#
repositories.description: C# template for generating Vivox tokens and integrating with AGS.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Java
repositories.description: Java template for generating Vivox tokens and integrating with AGS.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Python
repositories.description: Python template for generating Vivox tokens and integrating with AGS.

title: Rank Suite
description: A weekly MMR-based ranking system for AGS that keeps player standings up to date and resets them on a fixed schedule.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Rank Suite
repositories.description: Parent project of the ranking services, contains git submodules of the API, Manager, and Event Listener.

repositories.title: Extend Rank API
repositories.description: Backend service providing REST API endpoints for admin and game clients.

repositories.title: Extend Rank Manager
repositories.description: Orchestrator and the main logic of the Rank Suite. Contains schedulers and managers.

repositories.title: Extend Rank Stats Listener
repositories.description: Event handler app that receives and processes AGS Statistics events.

title: Core Matchmaker
description: A customizable matchmaking service that exposes a secure gRPC endpoint with observability built in, including a simple two-player match example.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Core Matchmaker
repositories.description: Go implementation of the overrideable matchmaking logic with authentication and telemetry support.

title: Challenge Suite
description: A configurable system for daily missions, quests, achievements, and seasonal events. Uses JSON configs and AGS services to track progress and deliver rewards.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Suite
repositories.description: Parent project for all the Extend Challenge apps, contains tooling and scripts to run and test the Challenge Suite locally.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Common
repositories.description: Shared Go models and interfaces used across Challenge Suite components.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Service
repositories.description: Go REST and gRPC service for challenge definitions, progress tracking, and event handling.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Event Handler
repositories.description: Go event processor that updates challenge progress in response to gameplay events.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Demo App
repositories.description: CLI/TUI demo for testing and showcasing the Challenge Suite.

title: MMR Calculator
description: A service that adjusts player MMR based on match results and writes changes to AGS Statistics.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend MMR Calculator
repositories.description: Go example showing how to compute and store MMR updates from match outcomes.

title: Gacha Suite
description: Backend and Frontend example for an idle-gacha game, including earnings, upgrades, gacha rolls, and prestige. Integrated with AGS wallet, stats, and cloud save.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Alphabet Gacha Server
repositories.description: Go backend for a sample alphabet-themed idle-gacha game. Integrated with AGS wallet, stats, and cloud save

repositories.title: Extend Alphabet Gacha Client
repositories.description: Game client for a sample alphabet-themed idle-gacha game. A web app built using Phaser.js

title: EOS Voice Integration
description: Keeps EOS Voice rooms in sync with AGS session and party state, and sends RTC credentials to clients through Lobby notifications.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend EOS Voice Integration
repositories.description: Go event handler that creates and updates EOS Voice rooms based on session and party events.

title: EOS Easy Anti-Cheat
description: Authenticates and evaluates EAC signals, maps them to your enforcement policies, and triggers actions such as bans, reports, or telemetry updates through AccelByte services.
creator: AccelByte

title: Tournament System
description: Set up tournament, invite players, and track scores all in one place, making it simple to organize exciting gaming events.
creator: AccelByte
